person.persName: Patrick Upshire Major (Frankfort, KY, attorney and commonwealth attorney)

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, attorney and commonwealth attorney. Franklin County, Kentucky, native. Son of Samuel I. M. Major and Martha H. Bohannan Major. Educated at B B. Sayre's academy in Frankfort. Graduated from Union College of Schenectady, New York, in 1842. Read law under T. B. Monroe and Charles S. Morehead. Admitted to the bar in 1844. Attorney in St. Louis, Missouri, in 1850. Elected county attorney under a Democratic ticket in 1852. Elected commonwealth attorney for the Eighth Judicial Circuit in 1856. Attorney in Frankfort in 1860. Member of Masonic order. Member of the Odd Fellows Society.
